introduction.text: , Your InstaMoney loan installment is due on

info.text: .Maintain sufficient balance of EMI amount in your bank account registered with us before the due date.Hope you will clear the due amount. Request you to share a confirmation by saying yes no or already paid

customerSaysYes.text: Kindly Check InstaManey app for loan related information. Thanks for your co-operation. Hope you a Wonderful day ahead.

wonderfulDay.text: Hope you a wonderful day ahead

customerSaysNo.text: Kindly Check InstaManey app for loan related information. Request you, not to bounce the EMI amount, as the Default will affect your CIBIL Score. Thanks for your co-operation. Hope you a Wonderful day ahead.

thanksToCooperation.text: Thanks for your co-operation. Hope you a Wonderful day ahead.

DearIntro.text: Dear Customer, Your InstaMoney loan installment is due on

sorry-en.wav.text: Response repeating again and again. Please wait while we transfer the call to live agent.
